item.title: @elonmusk: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ FEDERAL AGENTS ARREST 1,000+ IN MINNESOTA OPERATION TARGETING FRAUD AND CRIMINAL ALIENS DHS just ...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ FEDERAL AGENTS ARREST 1,000+ IN MINNESOTA OPERATION TARGETING FRAUD AND CRIMINAL ALIENS DHS just wrapped the first week of a massive operation in Minnesota, surging 2,000 federal agents to the Twin Cities area. Over 1,000 criminal illegal aliens, including murderers, rapists, pedophiles, and gang members were arrested. Among them were individuals with final deportation orders dating back to 2001, 2004, 2006, and 2009, who had been living in Minnesota for years despite convictions for serious crimes including child sexual assault, rape, armed assault, and human trafficking. This is a 30-day surge operation following revelations of multimillion-dollar fraud schemes operating in Minnesota, particularly involving daycare centers. The fraud investigation turned up a larger pattern: criminal illegal aliens using the state as a safe haven. Assistant Homeland Security Secretary Tricia McLaughlin said federal agents are working to "root out this rampant fraud plaguing Minnesota." The operation includes agents from ICE's deportation branch, Homeland Security Investigations, and Customs and Border Protection. DHS hasn't disclosed the full operational footprint for officer safety reasons, but confirmed the surge is ongoing. Source: Fox News,@libsoftiktok

item.title: @elonmusk: Today's achievements for xAI and Grok: 1. A $20B Series E. 2. 19-1 win over GPT-5.2 in chess tournam...
item.description: Today's achievements for xAI and Grok: 1. A $20B Series E. 2. 19-1 win over GPT-5.2 in chess tournament by Vercel. 3. Grok engine powering Razer's all-in-one AI companion AVA. We are not even in the first full week of the year. P.S. Using Grok to quickly proofread and enhance my posts is a cheat code.
